value.title: How to Manage a Global Supply Chain with Power BI üî¥Talk Power BI LIVE (Subscribe & Join)
value.excerpt: Business is increasingly global, with supply chain crossing multiple vendors across country and continents.  Can Power BI help you manage the global Supply Chain? value.title: Power BI Apps and App Workspaces: How to distribute Power BI content to a Large Audience
value.excerpt: Power BI Apps are a terrific way to distribute your Power BI content to a large audience.  You can "Publish App" to Entire Organization or specific individuals and groups. Then any user (within the Group you provided Access to) can click "Get Apps" to consume your App - which comprises the Dashboards,
